snippet.title: SNES Longplay [295] Taz Mania
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

The game starts out well presented, well drawn and sounds nice but once playing, the gameplay starts to feel repetitive. You chase down kiwis of ever greater amount as you progress through the levels which get more twisted and contain greater amount of obstacles. Same as most games then, but it just bores me after a while in this case, I wasnt sure I was going to finish the longplay.

I did notice Road runner wiz by at one point in the game, but never saw it again after that. I would have made attempt to eat it if i did Wink

Finaly the credits roll and make the ending so worth while and a true credit to the developers talents. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
